scripts.demoheadless: set HEADLESS=true && npx wdio run wdio.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@demo'
scripts.smokeheadless: set HEADLESS=Y && npx wdio run wdio.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@smoke'
scripts.demo: set HEADLESS=false && npx wdio run wdio.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@demo'
scripts.test:demo: set HEADLESS=false && npx wdio run config/wdio.test.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@demo'
scripts.uat:demo: set HEADLESS=false && npx wdio run config/wdio.uat.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@demo'
scripts.debugdemo: set DEBUG=true && npx wdio run wdio.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@demo'
